author: jvanzyl
msg: The stylesheets for dvsl xformations are now installed in the ${maven.home}
directory as part of the bootstrap process. We are starting to build up
the ${maven.home} directory in the process of trying to determine what
the best installation procedure should be.

placed in the ${maven.home}/stylesheets directory as part of the the
bootstrap process. So the stylesheets will be part of the maven

author: jvanzyl

author: brekke
msg: This is the default generated build.xml so maven hasn't been started up yet.  Now that we moved some properties out of project.properties and into maven, maven needs to process the project descriptor before this file is loaded.  It is being loaded in the init target after maven starts and no longer should be loaded here.
